roleset.name: make sensitive, making or becoming sensitive
roleset.note: SENSITIZE-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. (from sensitize.01-v)

example.name: all args, weird usage
example.text: ``We-1 hope [*-1] to sensitize employers'' to recognize the problems so they can do something about them, Dr. Warshaw said.
example.arg: so they can do something about them

example.name: Arg1,2
example.text: Occupational sensitization to soy allergens in workers at a processing factory
example.arg: in workers at a processing factory
